history.content: Hello paano ba gumawa ng bank account dito, nadaming steps kung ano nao

Magandang umaga! To open a bank account with BPI, you can visit any of our branches or apply online through our website. You can also schedule an appointment with our branch staff to assist you with the process. We'll guide you through the easy steps, and we'll be happy to help you with the necessary documents and requirements.
